Notice: I notice that the academic of people in poverty and legacy applicants are about the same, but people in poverty have fewer chances of being admitted to a collage unlike legacy applicants.

How doe this relate to you and your community?: It relates to me community because in california we could compare the chances of getting into a certain type of highschool, middle school or elementary.
Headline: What are the chances of getting accepted in a good academic school depending in your money class?
ace_sentences: I notice that the academic performance of people in poverty and legacy applicants is about the same.
People in poverty have fewer chances of being admitted to a college than legacy applicants.
I wonder how many colleges provided this type of data.
I wonder which colleges provided this type of data.
This relates to my community in California.
In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of high school.
In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of middle school.
In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of elementary school.
The headline is: What are the chances of getting accepted in a good academic school depending on your money class?
